welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Aliquippa, USA! This charming city is known for its friendly locals and rich history. We invite you to explore and soak up all that Aliquippa has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Pittsburgh International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves domestic flights for airlines such as American, Delta, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves both domestic and international flights for airlines such as United, JetBlue, and Air Canada.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beaver Falls Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Beaver Falls Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Butler County - Kenny Scholter Field Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Allegheny County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Allegheny County Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at County Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at County Airport is responsible for all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
